en: You're reviewing some of the work you've done on your product previously when a realization hits you: this early stuff isn't that good. You've already surpassed your initial skill set.
This idea hits you hard, and you don't know whether to celebrate it or double down on your work.
This is a great thing! You celebrate your success, and taking the time to do so gives you a boost that carries you through the day.
Seeing how far you've come makes you want to push even harder. Where will you be in six months? A year? Motivated, you plunge right back into work.
